turkish_example_sentence: O büyük bahçeli köy evini istememiş olsaydı, şehir merkezinde modern daireyi alabilirdi
english_example_sentence: If she had not wanted the village house with big garden, she could have bought the modern apartment in city center
russian_example_sentence: Если бы она не хотела деревенский дом с большим садом, она могла бы купить современную квартиру в центре города
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O büyük bahçeli köy evini ______, şehir merkezinde modern daireyi alabilirdi
